TopicTitle: Did they just add dark mode?!?!?!

Articles.Content: I was on the forms, all the css disappeared suddenly then I saw the link "KSP dark red" and clicked, I have dark mode now!
Same, although for me, I changed it to dark dark mode. Were you by any chance opening the website on a mobile device?

That's what broke, okay! Regular KSP Dark and KSP Light are broken on most browsers*, but KSP Dark Red and KSP Light Red work normally.

 

*I haven't tested it on every browser, but it seems to be broken on both Mozilla and Chromium based browsers, which is already most browsers, and I presume that the theme being broken doesn't actually matter if you're using Lynx for some reason.

14 minutes ago, DoctorKerman said:

Same, although for me, I changed it to dark dark mode. Were you by any chance opening the website on a mobile device?

yes, you too?
Dark modes were added a couple of weeks ago. They're a work-in-progress.

11 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

Dark modes were added a couple of weeks ago. They're a work-in-progress. 

ya, that's why some things are white and I can't find the buttons again on pc lol, but this looks real good MY EYES ARE SAVED!
Congrats, you found one of the small projects I've been working on! We'll be updating them and making tweaks after launch and officially announce the feature later!

12 minutes ago, PD_Dakota said:

Congrats, you found one of the small projects I've been working on! We'll be updating them and making tweaks after launch and officially announce the feature later!

just some feedback on the red dark mode, the forum guidelines text is the same color, the start new topic borders are the same, also the insert image button is the same color as on the red light mode(I'm guessing) but it looks real nice!

Im on mobile 99.99999999999999% of the time and would love to be able to jump themes. @Ryaja is saying the theme button is at the bottom of the page next to privacy policy, but all i see? Privacy policy & contact us…. Any idea how to find and use this new magic on mobile?
